definition: to separate/to partition/to stand or lie between/at a distance from/after or at an interval of
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: Nowadays, the key way of energy-saving is to use the inorganic thermal insulation material.
sentences.chinese: 目前，建筑节能的主要途径是采用保温隔热材料。

sentences.english: Rock wool carpet heat preservation is low thermal conductivity of a kind of high quality thermal insulation material.
sentences.chinese: 岩棉保温毡是导热系数低的一种优质的保温隔热材料。

sentences.english: “It is the greatest insulator we’ve ever seen, ” he said.
sentences.chinese: “这是我们见过的最好的隔热材料”，他说。

sentences.english: We are looking for fibreglass insulation material. It would be better if the factory has experience to export to Australia.
sentences.chinese: 求购玻璃棉隔热材料，最好有出口到澳洲的经验。

sentences.english: Use boughs as insulators on the interior floor.
sentences.chinese: 把树枝当做室内地面的隔热材料。

sentences.english: Polyurethane Hard Foamed Plastic is an ideal kind of organic low temperature heat insulation material.
sentences.chinese: 聚氨酯硬泡是一种理想的有机质低温隔热材料。

definition: phenolic aldehyde/phenolic resin (used to manufacture bakelite)
acetal resin/Delrin/unplasticized polyvinyl chloride (uPVC or rigid PVC)
